answers.answer: I was in labor 9 hours & that was my first

Two and a half days with my first, my second was a scheduled csection. I had preeclampsia with my first and the medications they gave me would not allow me to dialate past a 5. If you can ask our mom about her labor.
I started having contractions at 1 am and had my daughter at 4:09 pm.I only pushed for 20 minutes and she was out
I was in for 6 with my first and 9 with my second.
A little under 5 hours for me.
I was in labor about 5 hours with my son
With my first bb i was in labor 17 hours n my second bb 7hours! It all depends on ur body!
My only was5.hr. and 30min of that was hard labor. First and only so far

It all depends on if you are induced.  Usually it will take longer but it can help to kick start by walking a lot. I was induced at 40 weeks and 6 days. I was in labor for 18 hours but only because I was pushing for an hour and half. He was coming in at a weird angle llus he was almost 9 pounds. But usually pushing only takes 30 mins. Just depends. But as long as you have meds to help the pain you will be fine.

question: This is my first pregnancy & I am curious to know how many hours were you in labor? I have 23 days to go until I have my first baby (some people told me that they were in labor for 12 hours or more) :/
title: How many hours? Just curious
